Question: This person was teased by other students for his accent and applied himself to reading.
Hints: His Imperial Majesty **** I, By the Grace of God and the Constitutions of the Republic, Emperor of the French.
This person entered the city, assuming its fall would end the war and Alexander would negotiate peace.
Unlike many generals this person did not turn to history to ask what Hannibal or Alexander or whoever did in a similar situation.
